it's it's adaptive in nature so it will look at a property on an object that you
want to observe and it will it'll find the best way to observe it and and if object observe is present and it can use

or um some of the different data libraries that are out there that kind of have their own way of storing

uh mechanism to observe all kinds of different things so that's a really big important new piece and what's nice

decoupled from the templating engine and even the the syntax the the syntax for
